cast.name: 佐迪·阿吉拉尔 Jordi Aguilar

introduction: George’s father’s last wish is to have a Viking funeral: to be cremated at sea in a ‘drakkar’. And for his son, fulfilling his last wish is crucial: not only will it honor his memory, but it will prove to himself and his family that he is capable of anything, that he is already well and has overcome the slump he was going through. However, the lack of means and the mistrust of his mother, brother and sister-in-law will not help at all. But sometimes persistence, a bit of luck and the love of a family can change everything.
